  BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV10635, BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV10630, BSP_VID_SENSOR_MT9M024, BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV10633,
  BSP_VID_SENSOR_APT_AR0132, BSP_VID_SENSOR_APT_AR0132RCCC, BSP_VID_SENSOR_DM385_AR0132, BSP_VID_SENSOR_APT_AR0140,

}
 Enum for sensor ID for image sensors exposure time. More...
 
enum  Bsp_VidSensorWdrMode {
  BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_DISABLED = 0x0, BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_1PASS = 0x1, BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_2PASS = 0x2, BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_2PASS_LINE_INTERLEAVED = 0x4,
  BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_MAX = 0x5
}
 Enum for specifying WDR mode. Used only for the sensors supporting WDR. Typically used for getting correct DCC file for given WDR mode Also sensor could be configured differently for different WDR mode. More...
 
enum  Bsp_VidSensorExposureId { BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_SHORT = 0, BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_LONG, BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_MAX }
 Enum defining different exposures that sensor outputs. More...
 

Detailed Description

In addition to the IOCTLs listed above the following common IOCTLs are applicable to this driver.

  • FVID2_START
  • FVID2_STOP

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_CHIP_ID   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x00U)

Get Chip ID.

This IOCTL can be used to get sensor chip information like chip number, revision, firmware/patch revision.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorChipIdParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] Bsp_VidSensorChipIdStatus *
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_CONFIG   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x03U)

To get the configuration at which sensor is running Use this IOCTL to get current configuration at which sensor is currently running.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorConfigParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_DCC_PARAMS
Value:
(BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + \
0x0cU)
BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
IOCTL base address for the Sensor driver IOCTLs.
Definition: bsp_device.h:229

IOCTL to get the DCC params, Used to get the DCC parameters like camera id, pointer to the bin file, size of the bin file etc. Supported only for the sensor which supports DCC.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorDccParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_EXP_RATIO_PARAMS
Value:
(BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + \
0x0aU)
BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
IOCTL base address for the Sensor driver IOCTLs.
Definition: bsp_device.h:229

IOCTL to set the exposure ratio from the sensor, Supported only for the sensor which supports WDR merged output or multi exposure output.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorExpRatioParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.

#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_REG_READ   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x06U)

Low level I2C register read. Advance IOCTL, not to be used generally.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorRegRdWrParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_REG_WRITE   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x05U)

Low level I2C register write. Advance IOCTL, not to be used generally.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorRegRdWrParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_RESET   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x01U)

Reset sensor chip.

This IOCTL can be used to reset sensor to power ON reset state.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] NULL
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_CONFIG   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x02U)

To configure sensor Use this IOCTL to configure sensor Resolution, FPS, raw/yuv , color Pattern.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorConfigParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_EXP_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x08U)

IOCTL to set the sensor exposure parameters, currently only change in exposure time is supported.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorExposureParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_FLIP_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x07U)

IOCTL to flip sensor output in H and/or V direction.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorFlipParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_FPS
Value:
(BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + \
0x0eU)
BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
IOCTL base address for the Sensor driver IOCTLs.
Definition: bsp_device.h:229

Reset sensor chip.

This IOCTL can be used to set FPS.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] NULL
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_GAIN_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x09U)

IOCTL to set the sensor gain parameters, currently only change in analog gain is supported.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorGainParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_WDR_PARAMS
Value:
(BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + \
0x0bU)
BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE
IOCTL base address for the Sensor driver IOCTLs.
Definition: bsp_device.h:229

IOCTL to set the WDR params, Supported only for the sensor which supports WDR merged output or multi exposure output Currently supports only WDR Enable/disable parameter.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_VidSensorWdrParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Bsp_VidSensorExposureId

Enum defining different exposures that sensor outputs.

Enumerator
BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_SHORT 

Short exposure

BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_LONG 

Long exposure

BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_MAX 

End of enum

enum Bsp_VidSensorId

Enum for sensor ID for image sensors exposure time.

Enumerator
BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV10635 

Omnivision OV10635 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV10630 

Omnivision OV10630 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_MT9M024 

Aptina MT9M024 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV10633 

Omnivision OV10633 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_APT_AR0132 

Aptina AR0132 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_APT_AR0132RCCC 

Aptina AR0132 RCCC sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_DM385_AR0132 

TI DM385 ISP + AR0132 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_APT_AR0140 

Aptina AR0140 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV10640 

Omnivision OV10640 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_IMX224 

Sony IMX224 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV2659 

Omnivision OV2659 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV2775 

Omnivision OV2775 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_OV490 

Omnivision OV490 sensor

BSP_VID_SENSOR_MAX 

Max

enum Bsp_VidSensorWdrMode

Enum for specifying WDR mode. Used only for the sensors supporting WDR. Typically used for getting correct DCC file for given WDR mode Also sensor could be configured differently for different WDR mode.

Enumerator
BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_DISABLED 

WDR Disabled

BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_1PASS 

Single PASS WDR mode

BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_2PASS 

Two PASS WDR mode

BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_2PASS_LINE_INTERLEAVED 

Two PASS WDR mode

BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_MAX 

MAX Sensor Mode
